This project is about controlling the Eventide H9 midi fx unit.
This is possible with midi sysex messages. The specifications can be found in documentation/Eventide h9 141309_MIDISysexMessages.pdf

## Documenation
- H9 sysex messages: documentation/Eventide h9 141309_MIDISysexMessages.pdf
- H9 Algorithm Guide: documentation/H9AlgorithmGuide+V12.pdf
